message.content: Some of the biggest challenges adults in Peru face include high levels of poverty and income inequality, limited access to quality education and healthcare, unemployment or underemployment, and a lack of formal job opportunities. Additionally, there are issues related to inadequate social security and pension systems, limited access to credit and financial services, and high levels of corruption within the government. Furthermore, there are challenges related to crime and public safety, as well as issues such as the prevalence of informal work and limited job security.
